## About

A passionate road safety researcher specializing in human factors in road safety, and intelligent transportation systems. Experienced in translating research outputs into innovative safety solutions for diverse road users.

## Research Interests

Human factors in road safety and decision-making, assistive technology, psycho-physiological behaviour, Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), Autonomous Vehicles (AV) mobility, e-HMI and IoT
